activities: YouEarnedIt provides a Software as a Service (Saas) web application to companies that are based or have a presence in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland. Each employee has a user profile which may include personal data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: The personal data held in the YouEarnedIt platform may include: First Name, Last Name, Email Address, Date of Birth, Employment start date/termination date, and a photo. All personal information is available for review and correction by the individual employee.
recoursemech: US BBB registration for Safe Harbor dispute resolution.
